title: Tanguar Haor Floating Escape
description: Explore the vast wetland of Tanguar Haor on a houseboat surrounded by endless sky and water. Perfect for bird lovers and serenity seekers.
gallery: https://images.deepai.org/art-image/723d09e36c894587901e1aa91850b582/migratory-birds-flying-over-wetland-with-reflection-i.jpg
https://images.deepai.org/art-image/91e1d6d4eae747b78e3357790371451f/villagers-fishing-on-small-boats-in-golden-evening-li.jpg
https://images.deepai.org/art-image/e536529a908a4ef6ac8f46c18f0aa279/traditional-wooden-houseboat-floating-on-vast-tanguar.jpg

tourPlan.activities: Depart from Sunamganj, board houseboat, enjoy sunset
Explore haor islands, birdwatching, traditional meals
Swim in the haor, rest on deck, return trip

title: Jaflong River & Stone Collector's Journey
description: Discover the mystic Dawki River, traditional stone collecting at Jaflong, and the green hills along the Bangladesh-India border.
gallery: https://images.deepai.org/art-image/23877d1dccd44c29a9dd2667f88c93ae/crystal-clear-dawki-river-flowing-between-green-hills.jpg
https://images.deepai.org/art-image/e047f6122c2a49f4b61a985a2dd9cd53/foggy-morning-view-of-indian-meghalaya-hills-across-t.jpg
https://images.deepai.org/art-image/e2c64169f52449c2b46fbec67fa22aa8/bangladeshi-woman-collecting-stones-from-shallow-rive.jpg

tourPlan.activities: Departure from Sylhet, boat ride on Dawki River, explore Jaflong hills
Visit stone collection area, photography, return to Sylhet

title: Bagerhat Mosque City Heritage Walk
description: Walk through the UNESCO World Heritage site of Bagerhat, visiting centuries-old mosques and historical Islamic architecture.
gallery: https://images.deepai.org/art-image/125b29682e8e4907bb4a1c5616874379/stone-carved-minaret-and-historical-plaque-under-shad.jpg
https://images.deepai.org/art-image/5a0d89420fae486db00e86c2c920af96/sixty-dome-mosque-in-bagerhat-with-soft-golden-sunlig.jpg
https://images.deepai.org/art-image/7e2a54b5c5f7483f9d75c9722f293151/local-guide-explaining-mosque-history-to-a-tourist-gr.jpg

tourPlan.activities: Arrive in Bagerhat, visit Sixty Dome Mosque and museum
Explore nearby mosques and mausoleums, return home

title: Sunset Serenity at Hakaluki Haor
description: As the sun dipped below the horizon, golden hues spread across the vast wetlands. I sat on a boat, gently swaying with the ripples, watching flocks of birds return home. The calm water mirrored the sky, and for a moment, everything felt still and sacred.

title: Experienced Mountain Guide
reason: I love guiding tourists and know every trail in the hills

title: Sonargaon Folk & Craft Village Day Tour
description: Visit the historic capital of Bengal, explore traditional crafts, and roam Panam City’s colonial streets.
gallery: https://images.deepai.org/art-image/5a0d89420fae486db00e86c2c920af96/sixty-dome-mosque-in-bagerhat-with-soft-golden-sunlig.jpg
https://images.deepai.org/art-image/7e2a54b5c5f7483f9d75c9722f293151/local-guide-explaining-mosque-history-to-a-tourist-gr.jpg
https://images.deepai.org/art-image/125b29682e8e4907bb4a1c5616874379/stone-carved-minaret-and-historical-plaque-under-shad.jpg
Ancient colonial buildings in Panam Nagar with faded walls and cobbled path
Traditional craftsman weaving at Sonargaon Folk Museum
Colorful rickshaws parked beside heritage brick structures

tourPlan.activities: Morning trip from Dhaka, visit Panam City, folk museum, and artisan workshops

title: Chandranath Hill Sunrise Hike
description: An early morning climb to Chandranath Temple with a view of rolling hills and sunrise. A sacred and scenic trek for hikers.
gallery: Hikers climbing forest trail with sun rays breaking through trees
Chandranath Temple at hilltop under morning golden sky
Aerial view of Sitakunda hills with green valley below

tourPlan.activities: Evening arrival at Sitakunda, stay in hill resort
Early hike to Chandranath, meditation, return by noon

title: Moheshkhali Island Temple & Salt Farm Tour
description: A unique mix of spirituality and coastal village life with visits to Adinath Temple and salt-producing fields.
gallery: Adinath Temple on hilltop overlooking ocean during sunset
Workers drying salt under sun on flat white salt fields
Fishing boats docked at Moheshkhali shore under cloudy sky

tourPlan.activities: Boat ride to Moheshkhali, temple visit, salt field tour
Explore local village, traditional meals, return trip

title: Karamjol Mini Safari in Sundarbans
description: A beginner’s taste of Sundarbans wildlife with watch towers, boardwalks, and mangrove experiences in a single day.
gallery: Wooden boardwalk through dense mangrove forest in morning mist
Monkey sitting on railing near Karamjol animal enclosure
Watch tower view of vast Sundarbans canopy and winding river

tourPlan.activities: Boat from Khulna, guided walk in Karamjol, forest views, return

title: Patenga Beach Urban Getaway
description: Quick urban retreat to Patenga beach with snacks, sea breeze, and Chittagong city vibe.
gallery: Sunset over Patenga Beach with food stalls and visitors sitting on rocks
People enjoying street food under colorful umbrellas near beach
Fishing boat silhouettes with golden horizon at Patenga

tourPlan.activities: Bus to Chittagong, beach visit, street food tour, return

title: Mirpur Botanical & Zoo Family Tour
description: Enjoy a full day at Dhaka's greenest corner with exotic animals, gardens, and fun train rides for kids.
gallery: Kids watching animals in open zoo with green trees in background
Botanical garden walkway with families walking under shade
Miniature train ride in park with kids waving

tourPlan.activities: Visit zoo and garden, lunch on site, kids train ride, picnic

title: Rajshahi Mango & Silk Festival Tour
description: Indulge in Rajshahi’s sweet mangoes, visit silk factories, and enjoy riverside evenings in this cultural gem of North Bengal.
gallery: Local farmer holding fresh ripe mangoes under orchard tree
Worker weaving silk thread on loom in traditional Rajshahi workshop
Sunset over Padma River with boats and mango stalls nearby

tourPlan.activities: Train to Rajshahi, mango orchard visit
Silk factory tour, traditional lunch, explore city
